text: Benjamin Palm (born 24 September 2001) is a Ghanaian junior tennis player. Palm has a career high ATP doubles ranking of 1,907, achieved on 6 January 2020. Palm has a career high ITF juniors ranking of 923 achieved on 31 December 2018. Palm has represented Ghana at Davis Cup, where he has a win- loss record of 1–0. ==Davis Cup== ===Participations: (1–0)=== {| |-valign=top | {|class=wikitable !Group membership |-bgcolor=#FFFFCC |World Group (0–0) |- style="background:#B0E0E6;" |WG Play-off (0–0) |-bgcolor=#CCFFCC |Group I (0–0) |-bgcolor=#FFCCFF |Group II (0–0) |-bgcolor=#99CCFF |Group III (0–0) |-bgcolor=#FFCC99 |Group IV (1–0) |} | {|class=wikitable !Matches by surface |- |Hard (1–0) |- |Clay (0–0) |- |Grass (0–0) |- |Carpet (0–0) |} | {|class=wikitable |- !Matches by type |- |Singles (0–0) |- |Doubles (1–0) |} |} * indicates the outcome of the Davis Cup match followed by the score, date, place of event, the zonal classification and its phase, and the court surface. {|class=wikitable !Rubber outcome !No. !Rubber !Match type (partner if any) !Opponent nation !Opponent player(s) !Score |- !colspan=7|3–0; 26 June 2019; Complexe Sportif Concorde de Kintele, Brazzaville, Congo; Europe/Africa Zone Group IV Round Robin; Hard surface |-bgcolor=#FFCC99 |bgcolor=98FB98|Victory |1 |III |Doubles (with Isaac Nortey) | Gabon |Hervé Antchandie / Lyold Obiang Ondo |2–6, 7–6(7–1), 7–6(7–4) |} ==References== == External links == * * * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian male tennis players Category:Competitors at the 2019 African Games Category:African Games competitors for Ghana
